description.value:
30cm metal rod that can telescopically extend up to 4 metres on pressing an activation button. Given reliable anchors it can hold 150kg without bending or stress. Good Craftsmanship: 5m, 175kg, Best: 6m, 200kg. In 30cm form, can be Melee Weapon

Requirements

Weapon Stats: Melee;1d10 I; Pen 0 Everyone needs a good stick.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
